root.title: K mart KM comparable-stor februari sale UP
root.body: K mart corp say februari sale rise 13.1 pct year ago compar store sale four-week period end februari 25 rise 8.2 pct K mart say consolid sale period 1,459,193,000 dlr compar 1,289,635,000 dlr last year It say year-ago figur exclud sale discontinu oper design depot furr cafeteria bishop buffet K mart cite `` favor consum respons merchandis program say specialti retail excel februari sale
